parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The provided post does not contain a CMF number.  While the absence of a CMF number doesn't automatically exclude it from being electoral propaganda, it suggests it might not be directly linked to an official campaign.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions Victoria Stoiciu, identifying her as a PSD candidate for senator in Vaslui. This directly refers to a parliamentary candidate, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform.  It's intended to reach a wide audience, not just a select few. This satisfies Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The post's objective is to present Victoria Stoiciu, a PSD candidate, to a wider audience.  The act of promoting a candidate through a paid advertisement on a public platform strongly suggests an electoral objective to increase her visibility and, consequently, votes. This fulfills Article 36 (7) - c.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic. It's a promotional piece focusing on a specific candidate, lacking the objectivity and neutrality expected from journalistic reporting.  It's promotional material, not news.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a presentation of a candidate for electoral purposes. The post aims to positively influence voters' perception of the candidate.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1380816302896257</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific candidate (Victoria Stoiciu), is used during the electoral campaign period (based on the provided dates), has a clear electoral objective (promoting the candidate), and is disseminated to a wide audience via a paid Facebook advertisement.  While lacking a CMF number, the other factors strongly indicate its nature as electoral propaganda.  The post's purpose is to positively influence voters towards Victoria Stoiciu.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Victoria Stoiciu</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PSD</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Bună Ziua Vaslui, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei reclame plătite pe Facebook (ID postare: 1380816302896257) care promovează candidata PSD Victoria Stoiciu la Senat în Vaslui, având ca efect electoral influențarea pozitivă a voturilor în favoarea acesteia. Postarea, deși nu conține un număr CMF, îndeplinește toate criteriile propagandei electorale conform articolului 36 (7) din LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, referindu-se direct la un candidat, fiind utilizată în perioada campaniei electorale și având ca obiectiv electoral promovarea candidatei către un public larg.  Textul postării: "Invitata noastră specială este doamna Victoria Stoiciu, consilier de stat în Guvernul României și candidata PSD Vaslui pentru un fotoliu de senator." demonstrează clar intenția de a influența votul.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
